item.title: Enigma of Gravity
item.description: Embark on a journey through the captivating world of gravity, exploring its classical interpretations, potential connections to electromagnetism and quantum mechanics, and the cutting-edge theories that may revolutionize our understanding of this fundamental force.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)

item.title: Quantum Supremacy: Unveiling the Future of Computing with Michio Kaku
item.description: Explore the groundbreaking world of quantum computing with renowned physicist Michio Kaku in his captivating book, 'Quantum Supremacy.' Discover how this revolutionary technology is set to transform industries, solve complex problems, and shape the future of computing and human civilization.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)

item.title: Exploring the Mysteries of Quantum Physics ðŸ’¡
item.description: Unlocking the secrets of the universe with the fascinating field of Quantum Physics!
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)

item.title: College Physics 2 Rotational Motion, Vibrations and Waves, Fluid Mechanics, thermodynamics, and Electromagnetism ðŸ“š
item.description: College Physics 2 is a continuation of College Physics 1. It covers more advanced topics in mechanics, thermodynamics, electromagnetism, and waves.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)

item.title: Physics 1 Exploring the Physical World ðŸ”­
item.description: College Physics 1 is a foundational course that introduces students to the basic concepts of physics, including mechanics, thermodynamics, electromagnetism, and waves.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)
